title: Chapter 5
content: Lean out of the window, Goldenhair, I hear you singing A merry air. My book was closed, I read no more, Watching the fire dance On the floor. I have left my book, I have left my room, For I heard you singing Through the gloom. Singing and singing A merry air, Lean out of the window, Goldenhair.

book.title: Chamber Music
book.description: 简介： Strings in the earth and airMake music sweet;Strings by the river whereThe willows meet....
